protocol.name: P-GSE34924-1
text: VALUE = RMA pre-normalised and normalised to the median of the gene signal across all samples in Log2 scale.

protocol.name: P-GSE34924-2
protocol.text: Plants were grown in a growth chamber with 20 hr light, 4 hr dark cycle at 20 degree C.

protocol.name: P-GSE34924-3
protocol.text: RNA was extracted using the QIAGEN Rneasy kit

protocol.name: P-GSE34924-4
protocol.text: Labelling was performed using the Affymetrix 3' IVT express kit as per manufactures' instructions

protocol.name: P-GSE34924-5
protocol.text: Samples were hybridised at the NASC microarray core facility according to manufactures' instructions. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics station 450.

protocol.name: P-GSE34924-6
protocol.text: Scanning was performed accordinf to manufactures' instruction using an Affymetrix 3000 7G scanner

protocol.name: P-GSE34924-7
protocol.text: RNA data was analysed using Genespring GX 11 software (Agilent technologies) using the RMA probe sumarisation algorithm. Each gene signal was then normalised to the median of the gene signal across all samples
